ComicInfo.Title: [Untitled]; Costume Catastrophe
ComicInfo.Summary:
Rocko’s new job is more than he bargained for, so he’ll have to do whatever it takes to get fired. Featuring a backup story from David DeGrand that sends Rocko and Heffer to O-Town’s very own comic convention.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Jorge Monlongo | 1 | Sub | Portrait Subscription Cover | Miguel Mercado | 2 | FOC | Look and Find Variant Cover | Bachan (a) & Joana Lafuente (c) | 3 |
